data.comment: The match is underway. Fluminense have kicked-off.
Fluminense have been awarded a corner by Raphael Claus.
In the minute 1, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Fernando Pacheco.
Raphael Claus awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 4, Raphael Claus signals a Fluminense throw-in in Atletico Mineiro's half.
Raphael Claus blows against Fluminense's Luiz Henrique for offside.
Throw-in Atletico Mineiro.
Ball safe as Atletico Mineiro is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 6, Odair Hellmann (Fluminense) has taken off Fernando Pacheco who seemed to be grimacing with pain earlier. A possible injury. Caio Paulista is the replacement.
Atletico Mineiro awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 8, Throw-in for Atletico Mineiro in the half of Fluminense.
Fluminense to take a throw-in in Atletico Mineiro territory.
Can Atletico Mineiro get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Fluminense's half?
In the minute 10, Corner awarded to Atletico Mineiro.
In Belo Horizonte Atletico Mineiro attack through Guga. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Fluminense goal kick.
In the minute 11, Atletico Mineiro awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Raphael Claus signals a Fluminense throw-in in Atletico Mineiro's half.
Throw-in for Atletico Mineiro at Independencia.
In the minute 13, Throw-in for Atletico Mineiro in their own half.
Corner awarded to Atletico Mineiro.
Throw-in for Fluminense close to the penalty box.
In the minute 17, Free kick for Fluminense in the half of Atletico Mineiro.
Fluminense drive forward but Hudson is judged offside.
Caio Paulista scores to make it 0-1 at Independencia.
In the minute 20, That's a fine assist from Luiz Henrique.
Atletico Mineiro awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 23, Free kick Atletico Mineiro.
Attention is being given to Atletico Mineiroâ€™s Eduardo Sasha and play has been suspended briefly.
Throw-in Fluminense.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 27, Raphael Claus signals a free kick to Fluminense.
Rever for Atletico Mineiro has been booked by Raphael Claus and receives a first yellow card.
Throw-in for Fluminense in the half of Atletico Mineiro.
In the minute 28, Throw-in for Atletico Mineiro at Independencia.
Fluminense drive upfield and Yago Felipe gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Atletico Mineiro defender.
Fluminense to take a throw-in in Atletico Mineiro territory.
In the minute 29, Dodi for Fluminense gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Raphael Claus awards Atletico Mineiro a goal kick.
Goal kick for Fluminense at Independencia.
In the minute 30, Eduardo Sasha has recovered and rejoins the match in Belo Horizonte.
Can Atletico Mineiro get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Fluminense's half?
In Belo Horizonte Fluminense drive forward through Caio Paulista. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 32, Atletico Mineiro's Guilherme Arana gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Fluminense have a goal kick.
Igor Rabello is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
In the minute 35, Raphael Claus signals a free kick to Atletico Mineiro in their own half.
Atletico Mineiro have been awarded a corner by Raphael Claus.
Free kick for Fluminense in their own half.
Fluminense's Muriel is back in action after a slight knock.
Raphael Claus signals a free kick to Atletico Mineiro in their own half.
In the minute 37, Play has been interrupted briefly in Belo Horizonte to check on Muriel, who is grimacing with pain.
In the minute 38, Can Atletico Mineiro capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Fluminense's half?
Raphael Claus signals a Atletico Mineiro throw-in in Fluminense's half.
Ball safe as Atletico Mineiro is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 40, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Fluminense to take a throw-in in Atletico Mineiro territory.
Atletico Mineiro have been awarded a corner by Raphael Claus.
In the minute 42, Fluminense's Igor Juliao breaks free at Independencia. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Belo Horizonte.
Savio for Atletico Mineiro gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 43, Goal kick for Fluminense at Independencia.
In Belo Horizonte a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Igor Rabello returns to the field for Atletico Mineiro after picking up a slight injury.
In the minute 45, 2 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Throw-in for Atletico Mineiro in their own half.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for Atletico Mineiro in the half of Fluminense.
The first half has been concluded at Independencia.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Nathan for Atletico Mineiro who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
The second-half has commenced. Atletico Mineiro with the kick-off.
Corner awarded to Atletico Mineiro.
In the minute 46, The home team replace Savio with Marrony.
Nathan for Atletico Mineiro drives towards goal at Independencia. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 47, Free kick Atletico Mineiro.
Free kick for Fluminense in their own half.
Nathan for Atletico Mineiro is back on the field again.
In the minute 49, Fluminense's Luiz Henrique breaks free at Independencia. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Atletico Mineiro have a goal kick.
Can Atletico Mineiro get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Fluminense's half?
In the minute 50, Raphael Claus waits before resuming play because Igor Rabello for Atletico Mineiro is still down.
Goal! The home team draw level at 1-1 through Guilherme Arana.
Marrony instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 53, Can Atletico Mineiro get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Fluminense's half?
Igor Rabello is back on the pitch.
Atletico Mineiro's Eduardo Sasha goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
In the minute 55, Raphael Claus signals a Atletico Mineiro throw-in in Fluminense's half.
Raphael Claus awards the home team a throw-in.
Atletico Mineiro's Guilherme Arana gets in a shot on goal at Independencia. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 57, Fluminense awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Fluminense in the half of Atletico Mineiro.
Corner awarded to Fluminense.
In the minute 59, In Belo Horizonte, Hudson (Fluminense) misses the target with a header.
Ball goes out of play for a Atletico Mineiro goal kick.
Raphael Claus awards Fluminense a goal kick.
In the minute 61, Fluminense to take a throw-in in Atletico Mineiro territory.
Throw-in for Fluminense in the half of Atletico Mineiro.
Atletico Mineiro pushes forward through Keno, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 64, Atletico Mineiro have been awarded a corner by Raphael Claus.
Fluminense will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Atletico Mineiro.
Fluminense awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 68, Fluminense's Yago Felipe gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Belo Horizonte.
Marcos Paulo is replacing Luiz Henrique for Fluminense at Independencia.
In the minute 71, Atletico Mineiro have been awarded a corner by Raphael Claus.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Atletico Mineiro to take a throw-in in Fluminense territory.
In the minute 74, Free kick for Atletico Mineiro in their own half.
At Independencia, Allan for the home team has been yellow-carded. He will miss the next match due to a suspension!
Felippe Cardoso (Fluminense) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 76, Atletico Mineiro's Nathan is on target but unsuccessful.
Fluminense awarded a free kick in their own half.
At Independencia, Igor Rabello has been yellow-carded for the home team.
In the minute 78, The match at Independencia has been interrupted briefly for a check on Muriel, who is down injured.
Fluminense's Muriel looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Corner awarded to Fluminense.
In the minute 80, Raphael Claus signals a free kick to Atletico Mineiro in their own half.
Atletico Mineiro make their second substitution with Mailton replacing Nathan.
Atletico Mineiro have been awarded a corner by Raphael Claus.
In the minute 84, Corner awarded to Fluminense.
Atletico Mineiro have a goal kick.
Atletico Mineiro have been awarded a corner by Raphael Claus.
In the minute 86, Free kick for Fluminense in their own half.
The away team have replaced Felippe Cardoso with Ganso. This is the third substitution made today by Odair Hellmann.
Igor Juliao of Fluminense is pulled up for offside.
In the minute 89, Fluminense are pushing forward but Caio Paulista's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Belo Horizonte.
In Belo Horizonte a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Atletico Mineiro's Marrony attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Fluminense goal kick.
Fluminense needs to be cautious. Atletico Mineiro have an attacking throw-in.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 5 minutes of added time.
Raphael Claus signals a free kick to Fluminense in their own half.
Throw-in for Atletico Mineiro at Independencia.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Fluminense awarded a free kick in their own half.
Egidio gets his shot on target but fails to score for Fluminense.
Raphael Claus blows to end the match. The final score is 1-1.
